page.title: 20A Day in the Life of Joanne
page.content: I rise at 7.30, wash, dress, then eat breakfast which consists of cereal or toast. Then I take my bag and catch the coach to school at 8.15. There we have many subjects including English, French, Maths, and Science. At morning break I meet friends who are in other classes. Lunch-time is at 12.00 when I eat my sandwiches. After school I get home at about 4.30.I make myself something to eat and drink and watch television.Then I do my homework which is two subjects per night. Usually I play with a friend, Sarah but other times,I go for walks or play at sports with my family.Then I watch television until 9.00,.when I go to bed. I read for about an hour before sleeping. {The data in the last 20 pages was {collected and collated by the pupils {of Calstock School who would like {thank all those who helped in any way.
